derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent. (in sense 2 of the noun): from Latin respondent- 'answering, offering in return', from the verb respondere (see respond)

entry.tran: (调查和问题的)回答者;答卷人
entry.def: A respondent is a person who replies to something such as a survey or set of questions.

example.ex: 60 percent of the respondents said they disapproved of the president's performance.
example.tran: 60％的调查对象表示不认可总统的表现。

entry.def: A respondent is someone who has to defend a case in a law court.

example.ex: In addition, the respondent disclosed professional confidences to one of the patients.
example.tran: 另外，被告还向其中一位病人透露了行业机密。

means.word_mean: 1. the codefendant (especially in a divorce proceeding) who is accused of adultery with the corespondent

auth_sentence.content: New scientific diagnostic tools have been developed by the Respondent.
auth_sentence.res_content: New scientific diagnostic tools have been developed by the Respondent.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: New scientific diagnostic tools have been developed by the Respondent.

auth_sentence.content: True, videos have captured the unacceptable conditions described by this respondent.

stems_affixes.word_buile: despond[v.失望]+ent……的→adj.失望的,意气消沉的
spont=spond承诺,允诺+aneous……的→自内心的承诺

stems_affixes.value_cn: 通信,信件;[with]符合;[to]相当于,对应
stems_affixes.word_buile: correspond[v.通信;符合]+ence表名词→n.通信,信件;[with]符合;[to]相当于,对应

stems_affixes.value_cn: 被告;回答者;反应; 反射
stems_affixes.word_buile: respond[v.回答,响应,作出反应]+ent……的→回答的人→被告
respond[[v.回答,响应,作出反应]]省鷑.回答,响应,反应
cor共同+respond反应→共同反应→相互通信
de去掉+spond承诺,允诺→不再承诺→失望
re回+spond承诺,允诺→承诺回去→回答

Sentence.sentence: About 6% of respondents reported that "their relationships suffered because of excessive Internet use.

sentences.en: He stated that he had never seen the respondent.
